description:
Kurei Tamao is known as the "Walking Speaker." Not only is she the one to go to about gossip, but she`s also famous for her advice on love. She`s even had students from other schools ask her "What should I do about my cross-dressing childhood friend?" Knowing that, Nyarko decides to ask Tamao what she should do in order to get closer to Mahiro...
Source: crunchyroll
